content: k2 m1rp p to last 2 sts m1lp k2 2 sts increase d pattern row 3 with cc k2 m1r sl3 wyif k1 to last 5 sts sl3 wyif m1l k2 pattern row 4 with cc k2 m1rp p1 sl3 wyib to last 3 sts p1 m1lp k2 pattern row 5 with mc k2 m1r k to last 2 sts m1l k2 pattern row 6 with mc k2 m1rp p to last 2 sts m1lp k2 pattern row 7 with cc k2 m1r sl1 wyib k1 sl3 wyib with rh needle scoop the double strand floating 2 row below on rs of work and knit both together with the next st on the lh needle to last 7 sts sl3 wyib k1 sl1 wyib m1l k2 pattern row 8 with cc k2 m1rp p1 sl1 wyif p1 sl3 wyif to last 5 sts p1 sl1 wyif p1 m1lp k2 popple shawl version 1 // ©2024 the lamb & kid // all rights reserved p 3 for personal use only no portion of this pattern may be reproduced or distributed in any form or by any means without written permission visit follow share visit us follow us share with us #thelambandkid 740 winslow way east @thelambandkid and bainbridge island wa the lamb & kid #tlkpoppleshawl www thelambandkid com the lamb & kid
